name: Combo Specific Effects
author: Alucard648
info: Render combo effects when Link is on specific combo. Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: Not much to say. It renders animation effect on Link, when he is on specific combo/s depending on Link`s inventory.
setup: 1.Find UpdateComboEffects() function inside script file and copy RenderComboEffect for each combo that should have effect to render with following arguments:// cmb - leave as this// targcmb - if Link is on that combo (from combo table), render effect.// cmbeffect - combo to use for rendering animation// csetdffect - Cset to use for rendering animation// itm - item that cancels rendering this animation, for instace, when that item prevents speed penalty when walking on that combo.// reverse - if true, item mentioned in "itm" will be instead REQUIRED to render combo effect, like protective aura on boots vs damage combos.// drawover - if true, combo effect will render on top of link, instead of under.2. Global script combining: Put UpdateComboEffects() function after Waitframe() command inside main loop of active global script.
